      • pipe

        public Sensor<V> pipe(Generator<V> gen)
        Specify where the sensor will get its values from
        Parameters:

      • into

        public Sensor<V> into(IDataProcessor<V,?> target)
        Specify the destination that will receive the values from the generator
        Parameters:
        target - The destination to receive the values
        Returns:
        This sensor

      • start

        public void start()
        Starting a sensor will schedule a timer task that pushes values from the generator to the target at the specified rate of this sensor.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop a formerly started sensor. The running timer task will be cancelled and according to the semantics of the TimerTask.cancel() method
